mapper.update: update film set film_into =#{into}, film_starring = #{starring} ,film_director=#{director},film_imgurl=#{imgurl} where film_mid= #{mid}
mapper.select: select film_mid mid, film_mname mname, film_starring starring, film_into into, film_director director, film_imgurl imgurl from film where film_mid=#{mid}
